channel.title: Suitness for a Purpose on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Suitness for a Purpose on Simba Tango

item.title: Yes honey, but is it tango?
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Roy Lichtenstein: Girl with Ribbon (1965) There is always a lot of fuzz in the tango communities of the world about what is the right tango. And rightly so. There is good and there is bad tango. But in the middle of these heated arguments, we need to remind ourselves of one thing. Tango culture is rich. There is a lot of diversity in tango. Tango is not only dance. It is also music for listening.
